roleset.name: well known, popular, renowned

example.name: person
example.text: Famed animator Chuck Jones made it into a television special.

example.name: args 1 and 2, with &link. Sounds like a nice guy.
example.text: And we meet engaging crooks , such as Hassan `` the Head , '' famed [NONE-*] for his head - butting fights , his whoring and his hashish .
example.arg: - butting fights , his whoring and his hashish

example.name: arg1
example.text: Yeah well we re def not big and famous . Lol but yeah i guess it kinda has an indie feel
